mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.name, (case when t1.owner_id = #{userId} then 1 else 0 end) as editFlag from t_okr_teams t1 left join t_okr_team_user_rela t2 on t2.team_id=t1.id where t1.type='2' and t2.user_id= #{userId}
select t1.id, t1.name from t_okr_teams t1 left join t_okr_manage_object_team_rela t2 on t2.team_id=t1.id where t2.object_id= #{objectId}

select t1.id, t1.name from t_okr_teams t1 where t1.type='2'
AND t1.owner_id = #{userId}
